title: Aaron Donald, Cooper Kupp, and the L.A. Experience
description:
Jason, James, and Ryan begin their final pod of the season together by analyzing the Rams’ win over the Bengals in Super Bowl LVI and detailing their experiences watching the event. They then pivot to Dr. Dre’s amazing halftime show, (11:29) debate the choice for MVP, (23;33) and talk about Aaron Donald retirement buzz. (37:03) They wrap everything up by sharing their early matchup picks for next year’s big game (46:57).
Hosts: Jason Goff, James Jones, Ryan Shazier
Production Assistance: Chris Sutton
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
